name: There Is A Noise
description:
A short interactive story

Warning: This story is extremely dark and loreful, if you happen to not like dark stories, or lore. Go away, and give me a 5 star on BGJ 2022.1

Try to escape your house as there are monsters inside.

The Counseler always said "Marie. They cannot hurt you"

If you're wondering how this incorporates with the theme: The lore and the monster, technically it actually happened but the monster is not real. It is all in Maria's head.
